H0.text: who were the the continent of the americas named after logically. Christopher Columbus

H3.text: who were the the continent of the americas named after logically. Amerigo Vespucci

A4.text: 'America' derives from Americus, the Latin version of the Italian explorer Amerigo Vespucci's first name.
